sn35.139:1.2: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.139:1.4: Sights aren’t yours: give them up.
sn35.139:1.5: Giving them up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.139:1.10: and thoughts aren’t yours: give them up.
sn35.139:1.11: Giving them up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.139:1.12: Suppose a person was to carry off the grass, sticks, branches, and leaves in this Jeta’s Grove …
sn35.139:1.13: In the same way, sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts aren’t yours: give them up.
sn35.139:1.14: Giving them up will be for your welfare and happiness.”
